name: Goldie Baronbottom
description: Savvy businesswoman Goldie Baronbottom knows a good opportunity when she sees it--like the Cinderbrew Meadery. After barging in and swindling Wenbrandt out of business, Goldie mostly lets her cronies do the work. Even so, she's not afraid to roll up her sleeves and wallop do-gooders herself.

sections.title: Overview
sections.body_text:
Goldie Baronbottom uses [Spread the Love!] to launch Cinderbrew Bombs into the area. Goldie's weapon attacks can set nearby Cimderbrew Bombs alight.

Upon reaching 100 energy, Goldie Baronbottom casts [Let It Hail!] detonating any remaining Cinderbrew Bombs.

sections.title: Tanks
sections.body_text:
$bullet;[Let It Hail] detonates any remaining Cinderbrew Bombs.
$bullet;[Cash Cannon] ignites nearby Cinderbrew Bombs, causing them to explode.

sections.title: Tanks
sections.body_text:
$bullet;[Let It Hail] detonates any remaining Cinderbrew Bombs.
$bullet;[Cindering Wounds] iinflicts heavy Fire damage over a short duration to all players for each Cinderbrew Bomb that detonates.
$bullet;[Cash Cannon] ignites nearby Cinderbrew Bombs, causing them to explode.

sections.title: Damage Dealers
sections.body_text:
$bullet;[Let It Hail] detonates any remaining Cinderbrew Bombs.
$bullet;[Burning Ricochet] bounces to nearby players and Cinderbrew Bombs.

sections.title: Damage Dealers
sections.body_text:
$bullet;[Let It Hail] detonates any remaining Cinderbrew Bombs.
$bullet;[Cindering Wounds] iinflicts heavy Fire damage over a short duration to all players for each Cinderbrew Bomb that detonates.
$bullet;[Burning Ricochet] bounces to nearby players and Cinderbrew Bombs.

sections.title: Healers
sections.body_text:
$bullet;[Let It Hail] detonates any remaining Cinderbrew Bombs and inflicts heavy Physical damage to all players.
$bullet;[Burning Ricochet] inflicts heavy Fire damage over time to afflicted players.

sections.title: Healers
sections.body_text:
$bullet;[Let It Hail] detonates any remaining Cinderbrew Bombs and inflicts heavy Physical damage to all players.
$bullet;[Cindering Wounds] iinflicts heavy Fire damage over a short duration to all players for each Cinderbrew Bomb that detonates.
$bullet;[Burning Ricochet] inflicts heavy Fire damage over time to afflicted players.
